----------------

 * Doc and setup fix

0.3.0 01/06/2010
----------------

 * Handles unicode properly
 * Blocks SQL injection

0.3.0 10/24/2010
----------------

 * Added tagging autocomplete
 * Changed templates to not call code that only exists in Pinax. 
 * Removed extra_tagging_tags and put those elements in tagging_ext_tags


0.2.0 10/22/2010
---------------

 * Fixing some minor issues with templates

0.1.0 9/12/2009
---------------

 * Initial release
